help-file.title: DEFLECT
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster or until dispelled Type of spell: Protection
"Deflect" is a rather potent protectorate that reflects any spell cast at the protected Mage back at the caster. The enemy caster then absorbs the same adverse effects from the spell that he cast. "Deflect" will expire after a successful attack from an offensive spell.
